attributes.action: Create Europes largest vintage market in Walthamstow once a month
attributes.additional_details: Its our community and we can make what we want of it! Walthamstow deserves more than banana skins and men shouting "2 for a pound". My parents tell stories of finding their best outfits in the market when they was young and I want to revive that feeling for the younger generation and the future. If you feel the same as I do, feel free to sign this petition and spread the word! It would put Walthamstow back on the map as a more than just the last affordable postcode!
attributes.background: Walthsmtow is the largest market in Europe. It seems such a waste to restrict this market to simply fruit, vegetables and toiletries. I'm calling for the community to come together and create a monthly vintage market thus creating Europes largest vintage market, boosting trade throughout Walthamstow

rejection.details:
You may wish to contact the local council or your local MP about your ideas:
https://www.walthamforest.gov.uk/content/walthamstow-market
http://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
